node.text: There have been few that have represented the Spoked-B with as much class, honor, and respect as Zdeno Chara. His place in Bruins history is cemented forever. Thank you, Zee, for all you have done for our organization and our city.

node.text:
Ryan Sweeney – son of B's alum Bob Sweeney – ran the virtual @bostonmarathon as part of the @bostonbruinsfoundation team.

He chose today in honor of his aunt, Amy Sweeney, who passed away on Sept. 11, 2001.

We keep Amy, Ace Bailey, and all of those we lost 19 years ago in our hearts.

node.text:
Happy Birthday to one of the newest Bruins! 🎂 

Enjoy the day, @lullmark!

node.text:
15 seasons.
730 points.
962 games.
Two postseason scoring titles.
The Stanley Cup.

We can’t thank you enough, Krech, for all you have done for our team and our city.

We wish you and your family all the best.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Boston Bruins on July 30, 2021 tagging @dkrejci46. May be an image of 1 person and text that says 'Bank 一 CCM In January of 2007 when pulled the Black and Gold sweater on for the first time was 20 years old and was almost 4,000 miles away from home. BaueR Since then, you have embraced me as Bostonian. have given everything that have had to you and the Bruins, and over time, Boston has become a second home to me. met my amazing wife Naomi here, and our two beautiful children call Boston home. This City and your support are so special to me. 46 DAVID KREJCI'.

Photo shared by Boston Bruins on July 30, 2021 tagging @dkrejci46. Photo by Boston Bruins on July 30, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and text that says '46 CCM " The Bruins organization has always treated me with the utmost respect. am so thankful for my teammates, the trainers and support staff, coaches and management who have allowed me to be part so many great teams. Obviously the 2011, 2013 and 2019 teams stick out, but truthfully have loved every Bruins team have been a part of. 46 DAVID KREJCI'.

Photo by Boston Bruins on July 30, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and text that says 'CCM " Since the end of the season, as have thought about my future, has become clear that need to make a difficult decision for my family and At this point in my career and life need to return to the Czech Republic and play in front of my family who sacrificed so much to help me achieve my NHL dreams. want to play in front of my parents, brother and friends. want my children to live where grew up, spend time with so many Czech family members who love them and create lifelong memories. 46 DAVID KREJCI B'.

Photo by Boston Bruins on July 30, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'S 46 KREJCI aaിdds So for now, want to thank all the Bruins fans for the support they have shown my family and over the last 14 years. will forever be thankful. Thisis not goodbye, will not be a stranger. will be Bruin forever. will see you at the TD Garden soon, and I will always bleed Black and Gold. With gratitude, David 46 DAVID KREJCI'.

Photo by Boston Bruins on July 29, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and text that says 'It's one thing to hear it from a GM or a coach, but when you can get a teammate lobbying to try and get you on their team, especially 37 somebody with his respect in the league and the way he plays, it meant a lot and carried a lot of weight. NICK FOLIGNO ON PATRICE BERGERON BOSTO' BOSTON'S'.

node.text:
Two great Bruins.

Thank you, Sean and Jaro, for your contributions to the Black & Gold and best of luck in your next chapters.
